interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Bloomy Essentials Top 3 Organic Essential Oils Starter Set 10 mL (1/3 oz) - USDA Certified Organic - 100% Pure Lavender, Lemon and Peppermint Review Date: 2020/02/27 Store: Bloomy Essentials Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Bloomy Essentials', 'Scent': 'Lemon,Peppermint,Lavender', 'Special Feature': 'Pure', 'Seasons': 'All Seasons', 'Item Volume': '10 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 3.6 x 1.2 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '680912084567', 'Manufacturer': 'Bloomy Essentials'} Review Text: This set of three essential oils is very useful. The oils are certified organic and never tested on animals. The quality seems very high and the oils smell wonderful. The perfectly packaged set would make a great gift for someone beginning with essential oils or for an old hand since it contains three of the most commonly used oils.

Personally, I don't use oils medicinally unless you count the calming benefits of lavender in your mister. I use them either in a mister or atomizer or as a dot of fragrance on my wrist. Essential oils don't cause headaches or change their scent when I wear them.

The kit includes lavender, lemon, and peppermint. All three smell absolutely wonderful, whether you use them in a mister or add a drop to your washer's rinse cycle. I always add a drop or two to loads containing our bedding. It's delightful.

I would definitely buy Bloomy's brand again. I'm very impressed with the fragrance and quality. Review Title: Lovely Essential Oils Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Manicure and Pedicure Nail Clipper from POWERGROOMING - Powerful Trimmer for Thick and Thin Finger Nails and Toe Nails - Included Nail File and"Catcher" for Easy Cleanup (1 Pack) POWERGROOMING {'Brand': 'POWERGROOMING', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Blade Edge': 'Straight', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Target Audience': 'Women, Men', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 1.3 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '653233212735', 'Manufacturer': 'POWERGROOMING'} This clipper is heavy-duty and sharp. It's rather thick, so it's best for people who let their nails get past their toes before trimming them; if your nail is fairly short already, it's hard to get it between the nail and your skin.

It works especially well for my husband who tends to let his nails go because they're so hard to cut. No more. These clippers are up to tough nails and they cut them easily.

The clippers come with a small case that also includes a petite nail file. Recommended for tough jobs. Great for Tough Nails Bloomy Essentials Top 3 Organic Essential Oils Starter Set 10 mL (1/3 oz) - USDA Certified Organic - 100% Pure Lavender, Lemon and Peppermint Bloomy Essentials {'Brand': 'Bloomy Essentials', 'Scent': 'Lemon,Peppermint,Lavender', 'Special Feature': 'Pure', 'Seasons': 'All Seasons', 'Item Volume': '10 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 3.6 x 1.2 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '680912084567', 'Manufacturer': 'Bloomy Essentials'} This set of three essential oils is very useful. The oils are certified organic and never tested on animals. The quality seems very high and the oils smell wonderful. The perfectly packaged set would make a great gift for someone beginning with essential oils or for an old hand since it contains three of the most commonly used oils.

Personally, I don't use oils medicinally unless you count the calming benefits of lavender in your mister. I use them either in a mister or atomizer or as a dot of fragrance on my wrist. Essential oils don't cause headaches or change their scent when I wear them.

The kit includes lavender, lemon, and peppermint. All three smell absolutely wonderful, whether you use them in a mister or add a drop to your washer's rinse cycle. I always add a drop or two to loads containing our bedding. It's delightful.

I would definitely buy Bloomy's brand again. I'm very impressed with the fragrance and quality. Lovely Essential Oils
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Preferences:** The user is inclined towards high-quality, efficient grooming tools catering to tough nails, while also showing an interest in natural products like essential oils. They value versatility and effectiveness in both grooming tools and personal care items.

- **Target Audience:** The user’s interest spans products suitable for both men and women, indicating a flexible approach to grooming and wellness solutions.

- **Materials:** A preference for durable materials, such as stainless steel grooming tools, suggests a focus on quality, while their recent engagement with organic essential oils indicates a growing interest in natural, eco-friendly products.

- **Usage Patterns:** The user appreciates multifunctional items, as seen in their recent purchases that blend utility with an enhanced grooming or wellness experience. This includes the calming benefits of oils in personal care.

- **Feedback Style:** The user provides detailed, constructive feedback, emphasizing specific functionalities and personal use cases that help inform their future purchasing choices. 

- **Review Behavior:** They typically give moderate to high ratings (around 4.0 to 5.0), reflecting a balanced view that acknowledges strengths while also noting any limitations. 

Overall, the user prioritizes quality, practicality, and versatility in grooming tools and personal care products, considering both functional performance and natural ingredients.
